user.title: Set up Tibber Graph
user.description: Configure the Tibber Graph integration to display electricity prices as camera entities.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single instance is allowed.
abort.tibber_not_setup: The Tibber integration must be set up first.

init.title: Options
init.description: Configure how the price graph is displayed.

data_description.theme: Choose between light and dark theme.
data_description.canvas_width: Width of the generated graph image.
data_description.canvas_height: Height of the generated graph image.
data_description.force_fixed_size: Always render at fixed size (ignores camera size requests).
data_description.show_x_ticks: Show tick marks on the X-axis at label positions.
data_description.start_at_midnight: Show full 24-hour period from midnight, or from current hour onwards.
data_description.x_axis_label_rotation_deg: Rotation angle for X-axis time labels in degrees (e.g., 0 = horizontal, 45 = diagonal, 90 = vertical).
data_description.x_tick_step_hours: Hours between each time label on the X-axis.
data_description.show_y_axis: Show the Y-axis with ticks, labels, and spine.
data_description.show_y_grid: Show horizontal gridlines across the graph.
data_description.y_axis_label_rotation_deg: Rotation angle for Y-axis labels in degrees (0 = horizontal, 90 = vertical for left side, 270 = vertical for right side).
data_description.y_axis_side: Display Y-axis on the left or right side of the graph.
data_description.y_tick_count: Number of price ticks to show on Y-axis (leave empty for automatic).
data_description.y_tick_use_colors: Color Y-axis tick labels based on price levels (min/avg/max).
data_description.use_cents: Display prices in cents instead of main currency unit (use 'Currency override' to override '¢' as currency).
data_description.currency_override: Override currency display (e.g., 'EUR', 'SEK', 'öre'). Leave blank for auto: Tibber home currency (standard mode) or '¢' (cents mode).
data_description.label_current: Show a label for the current price on the graph.
data_description.label_current_at_top: Show current price label at top-left corner instead of on the graph.
data_description.label_font_size: Font size for all labels (X-axis time, Y-axis price, and in-graph price labels).
data_description.label_max: Show a label for the maximum price on the graph.
data_description.label_min: Show a label for the minimum price on the graph.
data_description.label_minmax_show_price: Show price value on min/max labels (if false, only time is shown).
data_description.label_show_currency: Show currency symbol on price labels.
data_description.label_use_colors: Color min/max labels green/red for easier identification.
data_description.price_decimals: Number of decimal places to show for prices. Leave empty for auto (2 for standard, 0 for cents).
data_description.auto_refresh_enabled: Automatically refresh the graph at regular intervals.
